TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_Tafalong, title = Tafalong, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tafalong} }

S.FORM: == Tafalong == u sulit nu Hulam: 太巴塱部落 u siwkay nu niyazu' i Hualien a kuwan nu Kalinku ku niyazu' nu Tafalong. u kasalumaluma' nu Tafalong sa, 1,007 ku luma'. kumud nu kasabinawlan sa, 2,958 ku tademawan. kasabinawlan nu Ingcumin sa, 2,609 ku tademaw, pakalatu 88%. u zuma sa, cay ku Ingcumin, 349 ku tademaw, pakalatu 12%. u Pangcah a niyazu' u kasabinacadan, Pangcah(Amis) 83%, zumazuma 4%. u pangca sa, u cidekay nu Taywan Incumin. tusa a bataan a mang ku tademaw. mueneng i Kalinku i Pusung atu i dadipasan nu bayu'an. satuuday a cidekay u Pangcah. u Sakizaya a tademaw izaw tu ku Sakizaya a tademaw itini, namabulaw i 1878 tayni milimek. siiluc tu tina niyazu'. nasulitan ni Liaw Socen. u cidekay nu Taywan Yincumin:

== Tafalong == o solit no Holam: 太巴塱部落 o siwkay no niyazo' i Hoalien a kowan no Kalinko ko niyazo' no Tafalong. o kasalomaloma' no Tafalong sa, 1,007 ko loma'. komod no kasabinawlan sa, 2,958 ko tademawan. kasabinawlan no Ingcomin sa, 2,609 ko tademaw, pakalato 88%. o zoma sa, cay ko Ingcomin, 349 ko tademaw, pakalato 12%. o Pangcah a niyazo' o kasabinacadan, Pangcah(Amis) 83%, zomazoma 4%. o pangca sa, o cidekay no Taywan Incomin. tosa a bataan a mang ko tademaw. moeneng i Kalinko i Posong ato i dadipasan no bayo'an. satooday a cidekay o Pangcah. o Sakizaya a tademaw izaw to ko Sakizaya a tademaw itini, namabolaw i 1878 tayni milimek. siiloc to tina niyazo'. nasolitan ni Liaw Socen. o cidekay no Taywan Yincomin:
